field.label: Time
field.help:
Type time at which you want to set access in following format:
[day-abbrevs] [h1:m1-h2:m2]
day-abbrevs:
S - Sunday
M - Monday
T - Tuesday
W - Wednesday
H - Thursday
F - Friday
A - Saturday
h1:m1 must be less than h2:m2
Use a comma or press Enter for new item.
TIP: You can also paste a comma separated list into this field.
